metadata.titel_preek: Trost ohne Gerechtigkeit: Wie die Bibel entstellt wird

primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The activation of human 'watchmen' to break the silence of injustice and force God to act through persistent prayer and political activism.

subject.identificatie: The Human Activist / The 'We' (Christians, Women, People of Good Will)
tekstueel_bewijs: Wir versuchen mit dieser Aktion, etwas für die Leute in El Salvador zu tun.
Eben das muss ich immer wieder von Neuem lernen.
Wenn wir alle Wächter geworden sind, können wir gar nicht mehr aufhören zu singen.

object.identificatie: Justice and Social Liberation (Jerusalem as a city of justice)
tekstueel_bewijs: bis dass wie Lichtglanz sein Recht hervorbricht

zender.identificatie: The Prophet / The Text (as a source of mandate)
tekstueel_bewijs: Die Wächter sollen nicht schweigen, sagt unser Text
Um Zions willen kann ich nicht schweigen

ontvanger.identificatie: The Oppressed (El Salvador, Soweto, the lonely)
tekstueel_bewijs: die Armen, die eigentlichen Adressaten der Botschaft
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: Does hearer identify with Subject or Receiver?

helper.identificatie: The Text/Isaiah 62 (as motivation) and the 'Dream of the Man from Nazareth'
tekstueel_bewijs: dem Traum des Mannes aus Nazareth anhängen
helper.rol_van_god: God is the Object of the Subject's pressure, not the primary actor.

tegenstander.identificatie: Silence, Academic Detachment, and Political Oppression
tekstueel_bewijs: Wissenschaft... benutzt als eine Art Panzer
Feinden... Fremde... die das Korn sammeln [ohne es zu essen]
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is structural and behavioral (silence), requiring human effort to overcome.

secundair_narratief_programma.subject: God
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: God's action is conditional upon the human subject's refusal to let Him rest.

voorbeelden_mens_subject: Eben das muss ich immer wieder von Neuem lernen.
Wir brauchen den sozialen und ökonomischen Hintergrund.

voorbeelden: Eben das muss ich immer wieder von Neuem lernen.
Um die Bibel richtig zu verstehen, brauchen wir den sozialen und ökonomischen Hintergrund
Es wird für sie möglich, Gott zu loben, wenn sie sich eins wissen mit dem Kampf

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon is heavily focused on the obligation (Devoir) to act and the knowledge (Savoir) of social context as a prerequisite for faith.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From ~S1 (False comfort) to S1 (Activism) by negating ~S2 (Silence).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Resolution is found in human speech and political identification.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: S2 is taken seriously as social suffering, but not as ontological sin.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: While the sermon uses 'liberation' language, the actantial subject is consistently the human activist. God is a passive power that must be 'reminded' or pressured into action by human 'watchmen'.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Wir versuchen mit dieser Aktion, etwas für die Leute in El Salvador zu tun.
Es wird für sie möglich, Gott zu loben, wenn sie sich eins wissen mit dem Kampf für Befreiung.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: The prophet and the 'watchmen' are models for the modern activist.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: God is the Watchman who never slumbers or sleeps (Psalm 121), who Himself breaks the silence of death.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Pressure to perform; guilt for past silence; call to political mobilization.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Soteriology is subsumed under ethics (Political Liberation).

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: Coherent as a political manifesto, but theologically incoherent regarding the nature of God's sovereignty.
spanning_punten: The tension between God 'creating justice' and humans having to 'remind' Him to do so.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: dem Traum des Mannes aus Nazareth anhängen

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: None; competence is derived from social awareness.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Sin is identified as 'silence' or 'wrong education' rather than a radical corruption.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon functions as a 'call to action' where the human subject is the engine of change and God is the recipient of human petition.

subject_herpositionering.huidige_probleem: The human 'we' is the subject of almost all transformative verbs.
subject_herpositionering.voorgestelde_herpositionering: Make God the Subject who installs the watchmen and who cannot keep silent.
subject_herpositionering.voorbeeld_revisie: Instead of 'We must break the silence,' use 'God has broken His silence in Christ, compelling us to speak.'

identificatie_herstel.voorgestelde_identificatie: Hearer as the 'Receiver' of God's justice.
identificatie_herstel.strategie: Emphasize that Jerusalem is saved by God's oath (v. 8) before the watchmen even speak.

modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Focus on how the Gospel gives the power to speak to those 'paralyzed' by the 'panzer' of detachment.

tegenstander_intensivering.voorgestelde_intensivering: Address the spiritual bondage that makes us love our silence.
tegenstander_intensivering.theologische_rationale: If the opponent is just 'bad education,' we don't need a Savior, just a better teacher.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: The passion for justice is vital, but ensure the 'Good News' is what God has done, not what we must do for Him.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorically, this is a powerful 'call to arms'; actantially, it is a legalistic burden.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis shows Isaiah 62:8 is God's oath, but the sermon treats it as a human political goal.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas reveals that God has been demoted from 'Subject' to 'Object of human persuasion'.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a classic example of 'Liberation Theology' where the structural engine is anthropocentric moralism disguised as social concern.
